E0100.title: Peripheral unresponsive
E0100.description: RotorSensor peripheral is not connected or not responding

E0101.title: Speed unreliable
E0101.description: Wheel sensors report unplausible speed data

E0103.title: Speed slow response
E0103.description: Wheel sensors have low pole count and IMU is not available

E0104.title: Cadence error
E0104.description: Cadence sensor has failed or the cadence value is unplausible

E0105.title: Distance error
E0105.description: The measured distance is likely not accurate

E0106.title: Altitude error
E0106.description: The measured altitude or pressure data is outside the specifications

E0107.title: Front wheel sensor error
E0107.description: Front wheel sensor has failed, short or open circuit

E0108.title: Rear wheel sensor error
E0108.description: Rear wheel sensor has failed, short or open circuit

E0109.title: Cadence sensor error
E0109.description: Cadence sensor has failed, short or open circuit

E0300.title: Peripheral unresponsive
E0300.description: RearLight peripheral is not connected or not responding

E0301.title: Tail light error
E0301.description: Tail light segment(s) have failed, short or open.

E0302.title: Brake light error
E0302.description: Brake light segment(s) have failed, short or open.

E0303.title: Turn signal light error
E0303.description: Turn signal light segment(s) have failed, short or open.

E0304.title: Temperature derating
E0304.description: Brightness is reduced to prevent overtemperature shutdown.

E0305.title: Temperature too high
E0305.description: Lights are turned off to protect the device.

E0400.title: Peripheral unresponsive
E0400.description: FrontLight peripheral is not connected or not responding

E0401.title: Main beam error
E0401.description: Main beam segment(s) have failed, short or open.

E0402.title: Temperature derating
E0402.description: Brightness is reduced to prevent overtemperature shutdown.

E0403.title: Temperature too high
E0403.description: Lights are turned off to protect the device.
